name: üìä Portfolio Performance Monitor
description: Comprehensive portfolio tracking, performance analytics, and automated reporting

assignments.name: performanceAlert
assignments.value:
={{ {
  type: 'PORTFOLIO_PERFORMANCE',
  title: 'üìä Portfolio Performance Alert',
  priority: $json.portfolioAnalysis.recommendations.priority,
  totalReturn: $json.portfolioAnalysis.accountSummary.totalReturnPercentage + '%',
  equity: '$' + $json.portfolioAnalysis.accountSummary.totalEquity,
  positions: $json.portfolioAnalysis.riskMetrics.positionCount,
  leverage: $json.portfolioAnalysis.riskMetrics.leverageRatio + 'x',
  winRate: $json.portfolioAnalysis.performanceMetrics.winRate + '%',
  recommendations: $json.portfolioAnalysis.recommendations.suggestions.join('; '),
  action: $json.portfolioAnalysis.recommendations.action,
  timestamp: $json.portfolioAnalysis.timestamp,
  alerts: {
    highRisk: $json.portfolioAnalysis.alerts.highRisk,
    largeDrawdown: $json.portfolioAnalysis.alerts.largeDrawdown,
    lowWinRate: $json.portfolioAnalysis.alerts.lowWinRate,
    concentrationRisk: $json.portfolioAnalysis.alerts.concentrationRisk
  }
} }}

assignments.name: reportNotification
